name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Route AZKi 3D Acoustic LIVE 「Route If」アルバムリリース記念ライブ【#ルートAZKiライブ】 [0NXvBO1E6fM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: AZKi performs an acoustic version of "Kimi no Shiranai Monogatari" in a night-themed gazebo setting, accompanied by a pianist and a guitarist.

subtitles.original: 君の知らない物語
subtitles.english: The Story You Don't Know

subtitles.original: 「たまにはいいこと言うんだね」なんてみんなして言って笑った
subtitles.english: "You say something good for once," everyone said and laughed

subtitles.original: 明かりもない道を
subtitles.english: On the path with no lights

subtitles.original: バカみたいにはしゃいで歩いた
subtitles.english: We walked and frolicked like fools

subtitles.original: 抱え込んだ孤独や不安に押しつぶされないように
subtitles.english: So that we wouldn't be crushed by the loneliness and anxiety we held

subtitles.original: 真っ暗な世界から見上げて
subtitles.english: Looking up from a pitch-black world

subtitles.original: 夜空は星が降るようで　いつからだろう君のことを
subtitles.english: The night sky looked like stars were falling; I wonder since when it was...

subtitles.original: 追いかける私がいた
subtitles.english: ...that I was chasing after you

subtitles.original: どうかお願い　驚かないで聞いてよ
subtitles.english: Please, I beg you, don't be surprised and listen

subtitles.original: 私のこの想いを
subtitles.english: To these feelings of mine

subtitles.original: 「あれがデネブ、アルタイル、ベガ」
subtitles.english: "That's Deneb, Altair, and Vega"

subtitles.original: 君は指さす夏の大三角　覚えて空を見る
subtitles.english: You point out the Summer Triangle; I look at the sky to remember

subtitles.original: やっと見つけた織姫様
subtitles.english: I finally found Orihime-sama

subtitles.original: だけどどこだろう彦星様　これじゃひとりぼっち
subtitles.english: But where is Hikoboshi-sama? I'm all alone like this

subtitles.original: 楽しげなひとつ隣の君
subtitles.english: You're right next to me, looking happy

subtitles.original: 私は何も言えなくて
subtitles.english: And I couldn't say a thing

subtitles.original: 本当はずっと君のことを
subtitles.english: In truth, I always... about you...

subtitles.original: どこかでわかっていた　見つかったって
subtitles.english: ...knew somewhere inside; even if I found you...

subtitles.original: 届きはしない　だめだよ
subtitles.english: ...it won't reach; it's no good...

subtitles.original: 泣かないで　そう言い聞かせた
subtitles.english: ..."don't cry," I told myself

subtitles.original: 強がる私は臆病で
subtitles.english: Putting on a brave face, I was a coward

subtitles.original: 興味がないようなふりをしてた　だけど
subtitles.english: Pretending to have no interest, but...

subtitles.original: 胸を刺す痛みは増してく
subtitles.english: The pain piercing my chest keeps growing

subtitles.original: ああそうか　好きになるってこういうことなんだね
subtitles.english: Ah, I see, falling in love is a thing like this, isn't it?

subtitles.original: どうしたい？言ってごらん
subtitles.english: What do you want to do? Go ahead and say it

subtitles.original: 心の声がする
subtitles.english: My heart's voice calls out

subtitles.original: 君の隣がいい
subtitles.english: I want to be by your side

subtitles.original: 真実はお残酷だ
subtitles.english: The truth is cruel

subtitles.original: 言わなかった
subtitles.english: I didn't say it

subtitles.original: 言えなかった
subtitles.english: I couldn't say it

subtitles.original: 二度と戻れない
subtitles.english: I can never go back

subtitles.original: あの夏の日
subtitles.english: That summer day...

subtitles.original: きらめく星
subtitles.english: ...the twinkling stars...

subtitles.original: 今でも思い出せるよ
subtitles.english: I can still remember them now

subtitles.original: 笑った顔も
subtitles.english: Your laughing face...

subtitles.original: 怒った顔も
subtitles.english: ...your angry face...

subtitles.original: 大好きでした
subtitles.english: I loved them all

subtitles.original: おかしいよね　わかってたのに
subtitles.english: It's strange, isn't it? Even though I knew...

subtitles.original: 君の知らない　私だけの秘密
subtitles.english: My secret alone, that you don't know

subtitles.original: 夜を越えて
subtitles.english: Crossing the night...

subtitles.original: 遠い思い出の君が指をさす
subtitles.english: ...you in my distant memories point your finger...

subtitles.original: 無邪気な声で
subtitles.english: ...with an innocent voice
